name: Black Bean Spread
description: It’s a fiesta of flavour. This easy-to-make dip is great for entertaining and game nights. And leftovers are so good in quick quesadillas.

ingredients.name: Creamy Ranch Dip or CCB Dip
Guacamole Dip Mix or Kickin' Jalapeno Burger Seasoning

preparation: In food processor, blend all ingredients, adding water if necessary, to desired consistency.
Spoon into serving dish, cover, and chill.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!
